ms.safi.btsync

Class BTSyncApp

  • Object
    • ms.safi.btsync.BTSyncApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class BTSyncApp
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    BTSyncApp is used for starting an instance of BitTorrent Sync. A BitTorrent Sync v1.3.105 executable for linux and windows platforms are bundled with this library.
    Author:
    Omeed Safi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BTSyncApp(String apiKey)
      Constructs a new BTSyncApp used to start a BitTorrent Sync instance with default settings.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BTSyncApp

        public BTSyncApp(String apiKey)
        Constructs a new BTSyncApp used to start a BitTorrent Sync instance with default settings.

        Default Settings:

        • device_name = "BTSync-Java"
        • listening_port = 0 (Meaning random port assignment)
        • use_upnp = false
        • storage_path = ./
        • use_gui = false
        • listen = 127.0.0.1:18080
        • login = user
        • password = password
        Parameters:
        apiKey - the BitTorrent Sync API Key

    • Method Detail

      • setDeviceName

        public BTSyncApp setDeviceName(String deviceName)
        Sets the device_name for BitTorrent Sync to use. The default is BTSync-Java
        Parameters:
        deviceName - the deviceName to set
        Returns:
        the updated BTSyncApp instance

      • setListeningPort

        public BTSyncApp setListeningPort(int listeningPort)
        Sets the listening_port for BitTorrent Sync to use. The default is 0 which means a port is randomly assigned
        Parameters:
        listeningPort - the listeningPort to set
        Returns:
        the updated BTSyncApp instance

      • setUseUpnp

        public BTSyncApp setUseUpnp(boolean useUpnp)
        Sets the use_upnp flag for BitTorrent Sync. The default is false. Need more research to understand what this flag actually is for better description.
        Parameters:
        useUpnp - whether BitTorrent Sync will use UPNP or not
        Returns:
        the updated BTSyncApp instance

      • setStoragePath

        public BTSyncApp setStoragePath(String storagePath)
        Sets the storage_path for BitTorrent Sync to use. The default is ./
        Parameters:
        storagePath - the storagePath to set
        Returns:
        the updated BTSyncApp instance

      • setUseGui

        public BTSyncApp setUseGui(boolean useGui)
        Sets the use_gui for BitTorrent Sync. The default is false. The use_gui option sets whether or not BitTorrent Sync should be shown when running. Effects of setting the use_gui value to true on linux is unknown as linux only has webui
        Parameters:
        useGui - whether the BT Sync GUI is shown or not
        Returns:
        the updated BTSyncApp instance

      • setListen

        public BTSyncApp setListen(String listen)
        Sets the address:port that BitTorrent Sync will listen on. The default is 127.0.0.1:18080.
        Parameters:
        listen - the address:port
        Returns:
        the updated BTSyncApp instance

      • setLogin

        public BTSyncApp setLogin(String login)
        Sets the username for clients to use to accessing BitTorrent Sync API methods. The default is user.
        Parameters:
        login - the username
        Returns:
        the updated BTSyncApp instance

      • setPassword

        public BTSyncApp setPassword(String password)
        Sets the password for clients to use to accessing BitTorrent Sync API methods. The default is password.
        Parameters:
        password - the password
        Returns:
        the updated BTSyncApp instance

      • startBtSync

        public BTSyncClient startBtSync()
        Starts BitTorrent Sync and returns an instance of BTSyncClient for accessing the BitTorrent Sync API.

        See the class description for the current limitations of this method.

        Returns:
        a BTSyncClient preconfigured for accessing the BitTorrent Sync started

        Specified by:
